Text.Text:
- Have you seen the twins - 
     - My precious wards -
          - They were here beside me -
               - Where have they gone -

- Mother Egenia -
     - It is what they called me -
          - In days so long ago -
               - But their Mother I was not - 
                    - no -

- Their true mother took her life -
     - She could not bear them -
          - They were her children -
              - Yet she chose death -
                   - why -

- A mothers tears for her dead children are terrible things -
     - But childrens tears for their dead mother -
               - More terrible still -

- I lay down and went to sleep -
     - For a moment -
          - Just to rest my eyes -
               - And then they were gone -

- They were my wards - 
     - Have you seen them - 
          - They have gone missing -

- Isair come it is time to eat - 
     - Gather your sister - 
          - Come Madae do not linger -
               - Someone may see you -

- I fear something terrible has happened to them -
     - Did I not love them enough -
          - Shielding them -
               - Against the arrows of the world -

- Isair the clever one -
     - Hide and seek through the Pass -
          - Never seen except for wind and a smile -
               - For he must never be seen -
                    - For they must NEVER be seen -

- Flames dance upon his fingers -
     - His blood burns with the Art -
          - He laughs so easily -
               - But when his laughter dies -
                    - His fury is like the storms -

- Madae the passionate one -
     - Beheld the symbols of the Ilmatari -
          - She learned of suffering -
               - But did not know it -

- Her heart is cold against Ilmater even now -
     - And the cruelest heart is a heart of winter -
          - Many such tragedies - 
               - Are carried upon the Northern winds -

- She now worships the son of Bane -
     - And has cast down all hope of peace -
          - Her heart burns with midnight fires -
               - But they burn in secret -
                    - For they must NEVER be seen -

- Both were filled with such promise -
     - They could have built the world ANEW -
          - Created LIFE in the North from ice and wind -

- Together their hands could have built BEAUTY -
     - A great cathedral of ice and wind -
          - But time and place and fate -
               - Were not ready for such things -
                    - Not ready -
                         - not now -

- The Sight is a terrible thing -
     - It forces us down paths we would not choose -
          - Is this your wish -
               - It is a LONG path I see -
                    - Once seen your fate is sealed -

- Your path shall lead through the eye of the Dragon -
     - Through prisons where time and fire are caged -
          - To bloodied fields where fallen dream of life -
               - In the ruins of battles long ago -

- But your path does not end there -
     - To the hand of darkness you will come -
          - A fist of chaos that curls in on itself -
               - And corrupts all it touches -

- There in its grasp are her children -
     - Her children -
          - My children -
               - My loved ones -

- I fear for their lives their souls -
     - Though lost so long ago -
          - And for you I fear -
               - It will be the greatest test you will ever face -

- But you have already traveled so far -
     - And your hearts are strong -
          - Do what must be done -
               - Their hate bleeds from past wounds -
                    - That have never healed -

- When you see my wards again -
     - I beg of you -
          - Show mercy -
               - Do not let them suffer -

- Life has taught them harsh lessons -
     - Ones they have returned in kind -
          - Yet I love them still -

- I wish to rest now -
     - I am tired -
          - But if I close my eyes -
               - I will never see my children again -
                    - And never know their fate -

- TELL me - 
     - I must know -
          - Or I shall never know peace -

- The tears of children are terrible things -
     - Echoes of the loss of their mother -
          - Yet the arrows of the world -
               - Arrows of the world strike deep -
                    - Leaving wounds that seldom heal -

- Too long have I have walked here -
     - Among ashes of the past -
          - I wish to rest now -
              - I am tired -

- One thing yet lingers -
     - Within you is a question -
          - Not yet asked -

- Why have you come here -
     - Why do you face death -
          - Here -
              - At the edge of the world -

- Have the arrows of the world driven you here -
     - To drown your heart in violence and greed -
          - Or is there something more -
              - Something more within you -

- Gold provides little comfort -
     - Fame is a twin-edged blade -
          - Glory fades into ink and vellum -

- All that remains -
     - Is you <CHARNAME> -
          - And your deeds -

- If the world forsakes you -
     - Your name is forgotten - 
          - Be true <CHARNAME> -

- Know that were it not for your courage -
     - The North would have died long ago -
          - And the hope of its people with it -

- I walk the last path now -
     - And yours yet remains -
          - Be strong when you make your final stand -
               - And you shall PREVAIL -
                    - Farewell -

- Very well <CHARNAME> -
     - May your defiance grant you strength -
          - I walk the last path now -
               - And yours still remains -
                    - Farewell -

- Ask -
     - I will answer - 
          - If I can -

- I remember the warmth of the Great Tree -
     - And our house in its shade -
          - And the hearthfire at night -
               - Gone now -
                    - all gone -

- The world is like the Great Tree -
     - Lives like roots -
          - Branching out from a single seed -

- Its branches touch all planes all times -
     - Touching everything -
          - I think that is its lesson -
               - The Great Tree teaches -

- Ah the echoes of the Heartstone -
     - In the shadow of the Kuldahar Oak -
          - The great gem -

- I whisper you a secret -
     - The Gem is the HEART of the North -
          - Beating beneath the great tree -
               - It tries to heal all it sees -
                    - But it leaves scars as well -

- Perhaps IT has brought you here - 
     - To heal a wound that has never closed -
          - Many facets it has -
               - Many eyes -
                    - One purpose -

- Their lives are no longer their own -
     - They stream from a shimmering mirror -
          - That ripples at ones touch -

- This rippling mirror is their weakness -
     - Attack them there - 
         - And you attack their twin HEART -
              - Otherwise your path will lead to ruin -

- My path here is done -
     - Yours now remains -
          - Farewell <CHARNAME> -

- NO I WILL NOT LEAVE - 
            - You have NO POWER over ME -
     - Here -
          - In this PLACE -

- I WILL NOT - 
            - SUFFER at YOUR hands -
     - EVIL ONE -
          - In this PLACE -

- PLEASE NO - 
            - My children FORGIVE me -
     - Where ARE MY CHILDREN -
          - CANNOT -

- I will remain NO LONGER - 
            - Walk your path BLIND -
     - And many are YOUR questions -
          - THAT SHALL HAVE NO ANSWER -

- You have returned - 
     - Have you found the twins - 
          - My precious wards -
               - They were here beside me -
Mother Egenia?
Tell me who you are again - and why you wander here.
What happened to you?
What can you tell me about Isair and Madae?
If Isair and Madae were so dangerous, why did you care for them?
I had other questions for you, spirit.
Leave, spirit!  Begone from this place!
By the power of my faith, spirit, I banish you!  Return to death's realm and trouble this place no more!
By the power of my faith, spirit, I banish you!  Return to death's realm and trouble this place no more!
Silence, spirit.  In the name of the dark powers I serve, I *demand* your service.
I will leave you, spirit.  Farewell.
Mother Egenia - what happened to you?
I will leave you, spirit.  Farewell.
"They?"  Do you mean Isair and Madae?
I will leave you to your thoughts, spirit.  Farewell.
What can you tell about Isair?
Tell me about Madae.
I will leave you to your thoughts, spirit.  Farewell.
Never be seen - why not?
What happened to Isair and Madae?
Tell me about Madae.
I will leave you to your thoughts, spirit.  Farewell.
If Isair and Madae were so dangerous, why did you care for them?
Tell me about Isair.
I will leave you to your thoughts, spirit.  Farewell.
If you are of the spirit world, then you must see a great deal that is hidden.  What does our future hold?
What can you tell me of Kuldahar?
Do you know anything of the Heartstone Gem?
If you raised Isair and Madae, then you must know their weaknesess.
I know what happened to your wards, Mother Egenia - at least what happened after you closed your eyes.
Why do you walk among the living?  You no longer belong here.
Mother Egenia, your time on Faerï¿½n is done, and you must sleep now.
I have nothing more to say to you, spirit.  Farewell.
Yes, I wish to see.
My fate is my own - now tell me what you see.
Never mind - I had other questions I wished to ask you.
I am done speaking with you.  Farewell.
If you wish them not to suffer, tell me their weaknesses.
I will do as you ask, Mother Egenia.  If they will not see reason, then they will not suffer by my hand.
There is more that I wished to ask you.
I have nothing more to say to you, spirit.  Farewell.
I do not know what happened to them after your death, Mother Egenia - but I will try and find out.
I know what happened to them, Mother Egenia - at least what happened after you closed your eyes.
There is more that I wished to ask you.
I have nothing more to say to you, spirit.  Farewell.

As they buried you, Mother Egenia, the villagers came upon them.  The villagers... did not understand what had happened.  They had assumed the children had slain you.  They attacked Isair and Madae, and the twins fought back.  The villagers did not survive.  And in a way, neither did Isair and Madae.
I will seek out the story, and then I shall return.  Before I leave, there is more I wished to ask you.
Before I tell you, there is more I need to know.
The tale is for another time - not now, spirit.  Farewell.
I will see if I can find out, then return.  Farewell.
Farewell, Mother Egenia.  Rest in peace.
A question?  What?
What do you mean?
My reasons are my own.  I need not explain myself to a shade.
Gold drives me, nothing more, and it is all I need.
I do not wish to die before I carve my name on the face of the world.
This injustice in the North must be set right.
Chance brought me here, on a ship from the South.  There is not a reason in all things, spirit.
I promised to protect the Ten-Towns.  I will not rest until my duty is carried out.
I do not know.  But if I find my purpose here in the North, then the journey will have been worth it.
Begone, spirit!  Leave, and trouble this place no longer.
Thank you, Mother Egenia.  Rest in peace.
What happened to Isair and Madae?
Tell me of Isair.
Can you tell me about Madae?
If you are of the spirit world, then you must see a great deal that is hidden.  What does our future hold?
What can you tell me of Kuldahar?
Do you know anything of the Heartstone Gem?
If you raised Isair and Madae, then you must know their weaknesess.
I know what happened to your wards, Mother Egenia - at least what happened after you closed your eyes.
Why do you walk among the living?  You no longer belong here.
Mother Egenia, your time on Faerï¿½n is done, and you must sleep now.
I have nothing more to you say to you, spirit.  Farewell.
The Great Tree?
There are other things I wish to ask you.
I have nothing more to say to you, spirit.  Farewell.
There are other things I wish to ask you.
I have nothing more to say to you, spirit.  Farewell.
There are other things I wish to ask you.
I have nothing more to say to you, spirit.  Farewell.
There are other things I wish to ask you.
I have nothing more to say to you, spirit.  Farewell.
Mother Egenia?
Tell me who you are again - and why you wander here.
What happened to you?
What can you tell me about Isair and Madae?
If Isair and Madae were so dangerous, why did you care for them?
I had other questions for you, spirit.
I will leave you, spirit.  Farewell.
Mother Egenia?
Tell me who you are again - and why you wander here.
What happened to you?
What can you tell me about Isair and Madae?
If Isair and Madae were so dangerous, why did you care for them?
I know what happened to your children, Mother Egenia - at least what happened after you closed your eyes.
I had other questions for you, spirit.
Leave, spirit!  Begone from this place!
By the power of my faith, spirit, I banish you!  Return to death's realm and trouble this place no more!
By the power of my faith, spirit, I banish you!  Return to death's realm and trouble this place no more!
Silence, spirit.  In the name of the dark powers I serve, I *demand* your service.
I will leave you, spirit.  Farewell.
